__TOC__

 
* Regular <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/IrishTeam/IRCMeetings/2010-09-15|Monthly IRC Meeting]]</nowiki> was held at 8pm Irish time on Wednesday 15th September.

* Members of our Loco did a great job of running <nowiki>[[http://ossbarcamp.com/|OSSBarcamp]]</nowiki> on 25th and 26th of September in University College Dublin. Write up <nowiki>[[http://www.lczajkowski.com/2010/10/04/ossbarcamp-wrap-up/ |here]]</nowiki>

* On Wednesday 29th of September the <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/team/345/detail/| Dublin]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/team/347/detail/| Cork]]</nowiki> Ubuntu Hours took place.  Both will kicked off at 18:00 local time.

* We had a great <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/team/348/detail/| Limerick Ubuntu Hour]]</nowiki> on the 30th of September at 6pm in the Absolute Hotel.

* Plans are under way for release parties for Maverick. The Dublin release party will be on 10.10.10. <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/team/375/detail/| More info]]</nowiki>
